description: standing, smiling female nude with PL foot crossed in front of PR leg, holding a staff twined with vines, with a pinecone finial, with her PL arm behind her bowed head; woman holds a large bunch of grapes in her PL hand, hanging next to her long wavy hair; tiny boy climbs up staff and reaches for bunch of grapes
signed: on base, incised: J. L. GEROME
title: Young Bacchus with Mother
